detail.content: NYU                                                                                                        Home         |         Procedures & Forms         |         Surplus                                             FAQ         |         Contact Us                                    Asset Labels        Asset Surplus         (with images)             Barcode Identification      Computer Disposal      Donation Request Form      Recycling Statistics      Asset Management Overview                                                  105 E 17th Street 2nd Fl New York, NY 10003 · Tel: 212.998.1040 Fax : 866.462.1422                           The Asset Management Office is responsible for maintaining the University’s capital equipment inventory. Capital Equipment refers to durable, self-sufficient movable property with a useful life of more than one year and a unit cost of $3,000.00 or more.        Our Objective is to provide current and accurate asset inventory information, authorize disposal of University owned equipment and to offer quality surplus items to the University Community, in a courteous and professional manner. If you have any questions please feel free to contact us.        Sustainability . Please follow the link below for information regarding       New York University Green Action Plan and Asset Management's ongoing      efforts in this endeavor.   http://www.nyu.edu/about/sustainability/                                                                                                              Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University.
